function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient time for environmental conditions to affect the viability of viruses in released aerosols","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to prolonged survival of aerosolized viruses","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce the survival of aerosolized viruses, such as increasing ventilation and air circulation","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, air purifiers, and HVAC filters","People":"General public, occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in extrapolating results from animal model influenza transmission studies to humans","Impact":"Misinterpretation of transmission characteristics and ineffective public health measures","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive studies to understand the anatomical and symptomatic differences between animal models and humans","Technologies":"Advanced imaging techniques, computational modeling, and data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Differences in influenza incidence versus meteorological conditions findings","Impact":"Inconsistent understanding of the relationship between meteorological conditions and influenza transmission","Mitigation":"Standardize methodologies to measure and analyze the impact of meteorological conditions on influenza incidence","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, geographic information systems (GIS), and meteorological monitoring devices","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
